text: There had been many such breakfasts lately since the affair of Parsifal. Harry had lost a good deal of weight. His normal placid and steady-going manner remained, but she could see that it no longer came naturally. It is the common lot of all Squadron Senior Officers to experience such catastrophes as the loss of a submarine, though in peace time these happenings are few and far between.
